A '''grave''' is an item introduced in [[25w14craftmine]]. A [[poppy]] and [[skeleton]] skull is seen in the item’s texture.

== Obtaining ==
This item is only obtainable via the {{cmd|give}} command.

== Usage ==
This item only serves as the icon of the "Oops" advancement, and does nothing else.
